attributes.action: Review OAP Industrial Life Insurance valuations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Industrial Life Policies taken out by millions of Pensioners who are now into their 80/90s do not
yield enough to give a decent burial.Insurance Companies are clawing back assigned with profits
justifying this as a state of the economy. How are
hard pressed Familys' of the elderly to afford a decent(not lavish) funeral for their old folks whilst the insurance companies are permitted to operate
in this manner.At 80 or 90 no elderly is about to review the value of their life insurances.
